fact_check_explanation_title: No evidence birds found dead on ship were killed by 5G
fact_check_explanation_summary: Misleading Facebook post claims that hundreds of dead birds discovered on the deck of a ship were killed by 5G.

fact_check_explanation_title: Viral impala picture is not a maternal sacrifice
fact_check_explanation_summary: The photographer says the impala was probably in shock and paralysed with fear.

fact_check_explanation_title: Fruit Shoot and oranges can’t test positive for Covid-19
fact_check_explanation_summary: What looks like a positive result is actually just the lateral flow test breaking due to it being used improperly.

fact_check_explanation_title: No evidence homeopathic nosodes can help side effects from vaccines
fact_check_explanation_summary: A post on Instagram claims that a used plaster could be used to help side effects from unspecified vaccines.

fact_check_explanation_title: Placebo recipients are treated as vaccinated for 16 weeks once trials end
fact_check_explanation_summary: The Department of Health has said that Covid-19 vaccine trial participants (current and future) should be considered as fully vaccinated.

fact_check_explanation_title: The CDC has not said PCR tests don’t work
fact_check_explanation_summary: The CDC has announced it will no longer request authorisation for one type of PCR test. It is recommending others instead because they are more efficient.

fact_check_explanation_title: Tanks in Paris were almost certainly there for Bastille Day
fact_check_explanation_summary: Social media posts have misleadingly suggested tanks were deployed in Paris in response to protests.

fact_check_explanation_title: Daily cancer deaths not higher than those from Covid during last 40 days
fact_check_explanation_summary: Communications consultant James Melville compares Covid-19 and cancer deaths but his figures aren’t correct.

fact_check_explanation_title: Facebook post on tetanus jabs gets a lot wrong
fact_check_explanation_summary: It is not true that if a wound bleeds, there’s no chance you have tetanus.

fact_check_explanation_title: Robert Peston overstated the importance of reinfections
fact_check_explanation_summary: It is true that people testing positive for Covid-19 more than once are not counted in the daily case figures—but it would only make a small difference to the total …

fact_check_explanation_title: Mandatory Covid-19 vaccine is only for care home workers
fact_check_explanation_summary: An amendment to the Health and Social Care Act has been criticised because it did not include a full impact assessment.

fact_check_explanation_title: Vaccines reduce the risk of death but don’t eliminate it altogether
fact_check_explanation_summary: Large numbers of people (including vulnerable populations) have been vaccinated, and therefore PHE statistics show that there are still deaths amongst vaccinated people.
